data.text:
@gillianoberholzer 

I dont see my last message i sent describing what i have done so far :angry: 

I completed the moving of all the requested users and have already changed the roles and updated their Details over to CourtWorks.

I am now looking into the reports.
I am trying to understand how we are going to incorporate the Company name into the above requested reports.

@neilbosworth 

Please specify how the Company name should be incorporated into the above sprocs.
If need be, then please save live reports and add the Company Name just so that i can get an idea what we i need to change or if it becomes a rewrite which will take longer.
